data.title: ACTIVITY
data.meta_description: The Globe and Mail offers the most authoritative news in Canada, featuring national and international news
data.text:
Baseball

American League

New York Yankees--Purchased the contract of RHP Jim Brower from Scranton/Wilkes-Barre (IL). Designated LHP Mike Myers for assignment.

National League

Chicago Cubs--Placed OF Alfonso Soriano on the 15-day DL. Purchaed the contract of INF Eric Patterson from Iowa (PCL). Designated INF Brian Dopirak for assignment. Placed RHP Wade Miller on waivers for the purpose of granting him his unconditional release.

American Association

Coastal Bend Aviators--Signed RHP/UT Ryan Smith.

St. Joe Blacksnakes--Signed RHP Ryan Williams. Released LHP Rick DeHart.

Can-Am League

Brockton Rox--Released RHP Billy Stokley. Traded RHP Kyle George to New Jersey for a player to be named.

Nashua Pride--Signed RHP Joe Gannon. Traded OF Jerod Edmondson to Brockton for future considerations.

Quebec Capitales--Released C Ozain Valoy and RHP Jorge Perez.

Sussex Skyhawks--Signed RHP Joe Orgovan.

Football

National Football League

Carolina Panthers--Waived LB Terrence Melton after reaching an injury settlement.

Green Bay Packers--Signed WR Donald Driver to a one-year contract extension through the 2010 season.

New England Patriots--Activated WR Donte' Stallworth from the physically unable to perform list. Released RB Quadtrine Hill.
